title: Refinance an Auto Loan
description: A customer wants to refinance their existing auto loan from another lender to get a lower interest rate.

tasks.description: Gather details of the existing loan (lender, payoff amount) and the customer's information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary information for the refinance application.

tasks.description: Run a credit check and provide a refinance offer, including a new, lower interest rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets approval and offers the customer a new loan that lowers their monthly payment.

tasks.description: If accepted, process the new loan and send the payoff check to the previous lender.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the new loan and issues payment to the other bank to pay off the old loan.
